channel.title: Services on Advocate Blokhina Natalia Viktorivna
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Advocate Blokhina Natalia Viktorivna

item.title: Consultations in the field of migration and customs law.
Drafting of complaints, applications, claims, contracts, receipts and other legal documents
Help in solving the issues that exist in Ukraine â€“ debts, loans, salaries, taxes, inheritances, etc.

Preparation and submission of applications to the European Court of Human Rights for the recovery of damages from the Russian Federation, caused in the course of military aggression by the Russian Federation.
Preparation of claims for the establishment of various legal facts, damages, recovery of damages, divorce, division of property, other.
Representation and defense of interests in courts of Ukraine in the mode of videoconferencing (depending on the region possible personal presence).
Representation of interests in the embassy, consulate, various government agencies and institutions of Germany.
